mapper.select: SELECT a.userIdx, userId, userNickName, experience, tendency, introduction, authSnsId, createDate, b.agendaArticleCount, c.basicArticleCount, d.agendaCommentCount, e.basicCommentCount FROM USER a left join ( select count(*) as agendaArticleCount, userIdx from AgendaAndDebateBoardArticle where userIdx = #{userIdx}) b on a.userIdx = b.userIdx left join ( select count(*) as basicArticleCount, userIdx from BasicBoardArticle where userIdx = #{userIdx}) c on a.userIdx = c.userIdx left join ( select count(*) as agendaCommentCount, userIdx from AgendaAndDebateBoardCommet where userIdx = #{userIdx}) d on a.userIdx = d.userIdx left join ( select count(*) as basicCommentCount, userIdx from BasicBoardComment where userIdx = #{userIdx}) e on a.userIdx = e.userIdx WHERE a.userIdx = #{userIdx}
